amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit a report to Congress on the status of the Integrated Border Enforcement Team initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 110-136 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to issue a report to Congress outlining the resources currently devoted to Integrated Border Enforcement Teams (IBETs) and making recommendations on how to improve the effectiveness of the IBET program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
